comments: She didn\'t give any feedback for our work no grades were posted nor papers given back to see how you did or if you can learn for the mistakes you made.
I don\'t understand the lukewarm reviews here. Disregard them. She is a great teacher and it\'s a very engaging class.

She knows her history very well and always has good suggestions for improving essays, but sometimes her comments are contradictictive and it\'s difficult to keep up with what she says during lecture because she has poor handwriting. I did, however, find the online notes and clips helpful.

She changed the test format in the middle of the semester. The notes you print off line are worthless, and she talks too fast while including information not found in the book that will be on the test. With the term paper, each draft she finds stuff she didn\'t like about that she didn\'t include on the previous draft. After you can change it.
